name: Joachim Parrow
content: Joachim Parrow's Home Page Joachim Parrow Home Page Professor i Datalogi, Uppsala Universitet Professor in Computing Science, Uppsala University Work This I do at the Department of Information Technology. Research I work in the group on Theory for Concurrent Systems My main area is formal methods ! In particular I work on the pi-calculus and extensions. Videos (In Swedish) Föreläsning vid doktorspromotionen 25 maj, Uppsala universitet (2022) A playlist about our results on nominal transition systems and logics (2019). The pi-calculus: Origin and recent developments (2012). Teaching Programmering STS UTNs pedagogiska pris STS-priset 2018 More about me Here is a brief CV with links to some papers on line. Here is my KTH inauguration, in Swedish. Here I play the piano! Play the game of Synchronous Chess! Or at least some Gomoku. Or play with Complex Numbers! Or learn to tow a trailer! How to reach me Joachim Parrow (email: firstname.lastname[at]it.uu.se Department of Information Technology Box 337 751 05 Uppsala Sweden Phone + 46 70 57 333 24 How to get here Last update:
